ch0317_00_pepper/0101_0701_01_10:
Look at you bursting with energy,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]!
ch0317_00_pepper/0101_0701_02_10:
If you’re tired, I can fuel you back up with
my cooking!
ch0317_00_pepper/7101_0701_01_10:
I’m all about that picnic life: the great outdoors,
the perfectly prepared sandwiches, all of it.
Not half bad at cooking either, I can tell you.
ch0317_00_pepper/7101_0701_02_10:
That’s why I decided I’m gonna be a cook! I’m
gonna keep working on my skills on Pasio as well!
ch0317_00_pepper/7101_0701_03_10:
It’s perfect since there’re some really
fantastic cooks here!
ch0317_00_pepper/7102_0701_01_10: Sandwiches bring back all kinds of memories.
ch0317_00_pepper/7102_0701_02_10:
Memories like my buds enjoying my food, and the
fun times spent with my special treasure...
ch0317_00_pepper/7102_0701_03_10:
And lots of other things too, like a certain Pokémon
being a little too greedy!
ch0317_00_pepper/7103_0701_01_10:
I’ve been doing a bit of studying here and there
lately, both about cooking and other things, too.
ch0317_00_pepper/7103_0701_02_10:
Finding out stuff you didn’t know about is actually
pretty fun.
ch0317_00_pepper/7103_0701_03_10:
*sigh* If I knew it was gonna be like this, I
wouldn’t have skipped school...
ch0317_00_pepper/7104_0701_01_10:
Pasio has a mix of cultures from different regions,
so I might find something interesting here!
ch0317_00_pepper/7104_0701_02_10:
Maybe even something better than the
Herba Mystica I found in Paldea…
ch0317_00_pepper/7104_0701_03_10:
Some hidden ingredient that can make people and
Pokémon feel better could be buried
somewhere—like treasure!
ch0317_00_pepper/7105_0701_01_10:
You seem to be the type that’s good at Pokémon
battling, [Name:PlayerNickname ].
ch0317_00_pepper/7105_0701_02_10:
Maybe you could train me sometime.
If you don’t mind...
ch0317_00_pepper/7105_0701_03_10: Oh, and of course I’ll do you a favor in return!
ch0317_00_pepper/7105_0701_04_10: I’ll cook you anything you want!
ch0317_00_pepper/1701_0701_01_10:
I was counting on you coming here, and
I was right!
ch0317_00_pepper/1701_0702_01_10: Don’t sweat it! That’s just how we roll, right?
ch0317_00_pepper/2501_0701_01_10:
In Paldea, I asked for help from my buds to make
my dream a reality...
ch0317_00_pepper/2501_0701_02_10:
but I also got a lot of help from Pokémon I caught
on the way.
ch0317_00_pepper/2501_0701_03_10:
I can’t talk about my adventure without
mentioning them!
ch0317_00_pepper/2501_0702_01_10:
Each Pokémon is unique, and I have loads of
memories with them and my buds, so...
ch0317_00_pepper/2501_0702_02_10: I’m pretty attached to these Pokémon now!
ch0317_00_pepper/2511_0701_01_10:
No matter how desperate of a situation you’re in,
if you’re with your buds, it’s gonna be OK!
ch0317_00_pepper/2511_0701_02_10: I’m just saying that from my experience.
ch0317_00_pepper/2511_0701_03_10:
If you’ve got buds who’re special to you, make
sure you take care of them!
ch0317_00_pepper/2511_0702_01_10:
I shouldn’t have to mention this, but
you and I are...
ch0317_00_pepper/2511_0702_02_10:
the best and strongest of buds! You better
remember that!
ch0317_00_pepper/3001_0701_01_10:
The weather’s nice today. Wanna go on a picnic?
I’ve got the cooking covered!
ch0317_00_pepper/3003_0701_01_10:
All right! For today’s lunch, I’ll make you the
absolute BEST sandwich you’ve had in your life!
ch0317_00_pepper/3005_0701_01_10:
I found some ingredients that help treat fatigue—
let’s use them to make dinner!
